name: Amexio Tab
description: Tab component for Angular Apps with multiple configurations such as Tab, Icon support

properties.name: active
properties.description: Set true for specific tab open as default tab..

properties.name: icon
properties.description: Supports glyphicon only. Can add directly home instead of 'glyphicon glyphicon-home.

properties.name: closable
properties.description: This flag will make tab closable, applicable for particular tab pills.
